sentences.en: All ministers, including the prime minister, will be answerable directly to him.
sentences.cn: 所有大臣，包括首相都将直接对他负责。

sentences.en: Alone with the small screen , I am answerable to no one.
sentences.cn: 单独面对着银屏, 我就谁的话也不用听了.

sentences.en: Councils should be answerable to the people who elect them.
sentences.cn: 市政会成员应对推选他们的人负责。

sentences.en: He is answerable to me for his conduct.
sentences.cn: 他对于他的行为该向我负责.

sentences.en: He must be made answerable for these terrible crimes.
sentences.cn: 他必须对这些可恶的罪行负责。

sentences.en: I am answerable to the company for the use of this equipment.
sentences.cn: 我要向公司承担使用这一设备的责任.

sentences.en: I am answerable to the headmaster for any action I take.
sentences.cn: 我采取的任何行动都向校长负责.

sentences.en: I shall be answerable for what she does.
I shall be answerable for what you do.
sentences.cn: 我会对你所做的事负责.

sentences.en: Just so , you should be answerable for not explaining.
sentences.cn: 的确,申辩一下是有必要的.

sentences.en: Parents are answerable for their child's acts.
sentences.cn: 家长对子女的行为负有责任.

sentences.en: She is answerable to the parents for the children's safety.
sentences.cn: 她应为孩子们的安全向他们的家长负责.

sentences.en: She was a free agent, answerable to no one for her behaviour.
sentences.cn: 她是个自由分子，言行不受任何人约束。

sentences.en: The agency is answerable to the governor.
They are answerable to God, not to the people in their charge.
sentences.cn: 他们是对神负责任, 而不是对他们所管理的人负责.

sentences.en: We should be answerable to our customers.

trans.tran_cn: 有责任的，应负责的，可答复的
trans.tran_en: a question that is answerable can be answered
